Header.title: Be in control
Header.paragraph: This is a truly private chat app, where you control the encryption. Create public and private rooms, and enjoy conversations with friends safely.

About.paragraph: In the background, we will encrypt the message directly on your phone or computer, and our servers will only store the encrypted message. We also do not store the room private password. All this is transparent and can be inspected in the browsers console. This way, you are in control of your privacy.

Features.title: Talk with privacy
Features.text: Unlike other chat providers, who can read your encrypted messages, in this app you control the encryption key, and we never store it on our servers, which means we can never read your messages. (Read more about this here)

Features.title: Create public rooms
Features.text: You can create public chat rooms which are not encrypted, and in which anyone with a link can participate

Features.title: Share with friends
Features.text: Talk with friends or strangers, and create as many rooms as you want. All your private rooms passwords can be stored securely (encrypted) in your vault (optional)
